actors.name: Users
actors.summary: Users of the DFIRE Protocol can interact with the DFIREStaking contract to stake, unstake, and claim rewards. They can also interact with the StabilityPool contract to provide liquidity and earn rewards.

actions.name: Stake DFIRE
actions.summary: Users stake DFIRE tokens in the DFIREStaking contract to earn rewards.

actions.name: Unstake DFIRE
actions.summary: Users unstake DFIRE tokens from the DFIREStaking contract.

actions.name: Claim DFIRE Rewards
actions.summary: Users claim accumulated DFIRE rewards from the DFIREStaking contract.

actions.name: Stake tokens in Stability Pool
actions.summary: Users stake tokens into the Stability Pool to provide liquidity and earn rewards.

actions.name: Unstake tokens from Stability Pool
actions.summary: Users unstake tokens from the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Claim Stability Pool Rewards
actions.summary: Users claim accumulated rewards from the Stability Pool.

actions.name: Open Safe
actions.summary: Users open a new CDP (Safe) with specified ID and amount.

actions.name: Close Safe
actions.summary: Users close an existing CDP (Safe) with a specified ID.

actions.name: Borrow
actions.summary: Users borrow a specified amount from a safe (CDP).

actions.name: Repay
actions.summary: Users repay a specified amount to a safe (CDP).

actions.name: Add Collateral
actions.summary: Users add collateral to a safe (CDP).

actions.name: Withdraw Collateral
actions.summary: Users withdraw collateral from a safe (CDP).

actions.name: Redeem
actions.summary: Users redeem a specified amount.

actions.name: Fee Topup
actions.summary: Users top up the fee for a safe (CDP).

actors.name: Owner
actors.summary: The owner possesses administrative privileges, allowing them to manage key parameters, add rewards, and perform maintenance tasks.

actions.name: Mint DFIRE tokens
actions.summary: The owner mints new DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFIRE tokens
actions.summary: The owner burns DFIRE tokens.

actions.name: Add DFIRE rewards
actions.summary: The owner adds DFIRE rewards to the staking contract.

actions.name: Add Collateral Rewards
actions.summary: The owner adds collateral rewards to the staking contract.

actions.name: Mint DFID tokens
actions.summary: The owner mints new DFID tokens.

actions.name: Burn DFID tokens
actions.summary: The owner burns DFID tokens.

actions.name: Add SBR rewards
actions.summary: The owner adds SBR rewards to the stability pool.

actions.name: Add Collateral Rewards
actions.summary: The owner adds collateral rewards to the stability pool.

actions.name: Fetch Price
actions.summary: Fetches the latest price from the Chainlink price feed.

actions.name: Set Price
actions.summary: Sets the price.

actions.name: Set Can Stability Pool Receive Rewards
actions.summary: Sets whether the stability pool can receive rewards.

actions.name: Set Can SBR Staking Pool Receive Rewards
actions.summary: Sets whether the SBR staking pool can receive rewards.

actions.name: Update Token URI
actions.summary: Updates the token URI for a specific token ID.

actors.name: Liquidators
actors.summary: Liquidators monitor the system for undercollateralized positions and trigger liquidation when necessary to maintain the solvency of the protocol.

actions.name: Liquidate
actions.summary: Liquidators trigger the liquidation process for undercollateralized safes.

actions.name: Liquidate Safe
actions.summary: Liquidates a specific safe (CDP) with the given ID.

actions.name: Perform Liquidation
actions.summary: Performs a liquidation with the given amount and collateral.
